rows.label: qst002310_msg0001
rows.name:
Moruru offer deepest gratitude to
friends for completing errand.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0002
rows.name:
This is Moruru?
And you're sure he is the Nopon
who stole my Platinum Music Box?

rows.label: qst002310_msg0003
rows.name:
He does not strike me as a
dastardly criminal...

rows.label: qst002310_msg0004
rows.name:
Chief of Guard Maurcio most correct.
Moruru is sinful Nopon, has made
many terrible mistakes.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0005
rows.name:
But wonderful old man Sephrian
kindly grant Moruru forgiveness
in name of Pope Marveni.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0006
rows.name:
Moruru is changed Nopon!
Devoted to path of goodness!

rows.label: qst002310_msg0008
rows.name:
We must trust in young Moruru's words.
Nobody is beyond salvation.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0009
rows.name:
The Pope's teachings and the
glory of Acedia have saved this
poor sinner's soul!

rows.label: qst002310_msg0010
rows.name:
My dream is to convey the Pope's
teachings to all the people of Alst!

rows.label: qst002310_msg0011
rows.name:
Old man Sephrian most wise!
Moruru follow teachings for all life now!

rows.label: qst002310_msg0013
rows.name:
If the devout Master Sephrian is
convinced, I suppose it is not my
place to argue.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0014
rows.name:
Thanks to friends, Moruru is free
from life of sin!

rows.label: qst002310_msg0015
rows.name:
My dear friends, you have saved poor
young Moruru from his own sinful heart
and righted his past wrongdoings.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0016
rows.name:
Would you care to become
my disciples?

rows.label: qst002310_msg0017
rows.name:
Would have liked to study teachings
with friends. Very much disappoint.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0018
rows.name:
Ah yes...Moruru tells me he has caused
you all a great deal of trouble, correct?

rows.label: qst002310_msg0019
rows.name:
Please take this as compensation.
It is only right that a master should
atone for his disciple's failings.

rows.label: qst002310_msg0020
rows.name:
This is of little use to me, with my oath
of non-violence, but perhaps you will
find some use for it.
